amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to subsidize Amtrak Food and Beverage Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to subsidize Amtrak Food and Beverage Service.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
